description:
Have fun with your friends with the great award-winning Circle of Sumo!
COS is simple and compelling at the same time, with a lot of different challenges. It's pure fun!

Take control of 8 different sumo wrestlers and challenge your friends on daring fights and sport based extra-games!

- Up to 4 local players
- 8 different characters
- 24 sumo arenas
- 4 crazy extra-games  
- 2 single player mini-games

Circle of Sumo is a must for the game nights with your friends!
name: Circle of Sumo
